Israel-Gaza War: Aid group accuses Hamas of attacking its envoy
The UN has warned that the entire Gaza population is at risk of famine, with over 200,000 Gazans facing catastrophic levels of food insecurity. No aid has entered the Gaza Strip in 70 days, and the situation is dire. Watch to know more!
